insertAuthor: INSERT INTO authors (name, login, email) VALUES ('%s', '%s', '%s')
insertTest: INSERT INTO test (name, status_id, method_name, project_id, session_id, end_time, env, browser, author_id) VALUES ('%s', %d, '%s', %d, %d, '%s', '%s', '%s', %d)
selectTestWithRepeatingID: SELECT * FROM test WHERE id REGEXP '([0-9])\\1' LIMIT %d
updateTest: UPDATE test SET name = '%s', env = '%s', browser = '%s' WHERE id = %d
deleteBatchTest: DELETE FROM test WHERE id IN (%s)
